Package org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel

Root package for the Active Endpoints Runtime for Axis (rtaxis).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeTypesContext Defines methods for looking up schema types.
 

Class Summary
AeAxisInvokeHandlerFactory Factory for the default axis invoke handler.
AeAxisServerFactory Factory class to return the static Axis server to either the AxisServlet (http) or JMS listener (or any other listener type for that matter)
AeBuildNumber  
AeElementHolder A wrapper for an element so Axis won't think we're trying to serialize a primitive type.
AeInvokeHandler Handles invoking of endpoint references on behalf of the business process engine.
AeMessages Accessor class for externalized strings
AePolicyInvokeHandlerFactory Factory for the default axis invoke handler.
AeRPCEncodedDeserializer Custom deserializer for handling complex types over RPC.
AeRPCEncodedDeserializerFactory Factory for creating rpc-encoded deserializers
AeRPCEncodedSerializer Custom serializer for axis that handles complex types over rpc.
AeRPCEncodedSerializer.AeNoOpDeserializerFactory  
AeRPCEncodedSerializerFactory Factory for creating rpc-encoded serializers
AeRPCLiteralDeserializer Custom deserializer for handling complex types over RPC literal.
AeRPCLiteralDeserializerFactory Factory for creating rpc-literal deserializers
AeRPCLiteralSerializer Custom serializer for axis that handles complex types over rpc literal.
AeRPCLiteralSerializerFactory Factory for creating rpc-encoded serializers
AeService This is a simple extension of the Axis Service object.
AeTypeMappingHelper Helper class for registering custom serializers/deserializers for sending/receiving SOAP messages using the RPC/encoded style.
AeTypeMappingTuple Stores the basic info necessary in order to register a custom serializer or deserializer for a message part.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.axis.bpel Description

Root package for the Active Endpoints Runtime for Axis (rtaxis).

Provides an implementation for an Active Endpoints Axis provider.
